name: TOEIC Scoring App
description: Application for solving TOEIC practice tests and automatically calculating scores. Manages multiple test sets and can record and compare scores for each answer sheet.
architecture: Full-stack application using Next.js App Router. Connects to PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM, managing complex relationships including TestSet, Question, AnswerSet, Answer, UserAnswerSheet, UserAnswer, and Result. Implements data fetching and updates with Server Actions. Organizes components with Atomic Design pattern and features-based structure. Score calculation is based on correct answers with a maximum of 990 points (percentage * 990).
features: Management of multiple test sets (e.g., official practice books)
Answer input functionality for 200 questions (supports Parts 1-7, qId 1-200)
Automatic score calculation (990 points maximum, based on correct answer rate)
Display of correct answer rate and count
Creation and management of multiple answer sheets (UserAnswerSheet)
Result comparison per answer sheet (Result model)
AI advice functionality (in development: AIadvice component not implemented)
User results list (in development: UserResult component not implemented)
